com.googlecode.flaxcrawler.parse
Class DefaultParserController

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.flaxcrawler.parse.DefaultParserController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ParserController
public class DefaultParserController
extends java.lang.Object
implements ParserController

Default ParserController implementation. You can set one generic parser and some custom parsers for specified domains. Generic parser will be used for Page if there's no compatible custom parser.

Author:
ameshkov
